name: cryptonet
description: Guidance for CryptoNet cryptography library in .NET. USE FOR: RSA encryption/decryption, symmetric AES encryption, X.509 certificate-based crypto, self-signed certificate generation, key pair management, encrypting sensitive data at rest. DO NOT USE FOR: password hashing (use ASP.NET Core Identity), TLS/HTTPS configuration, JWT token signing (use Microsoft.IdentityModel), or authorization (use Casbin/Enforcer).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
